segments.text: Sir , your hair is done . Anything else I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have a shave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , sir . Would you lie back so that I can shave you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . But my beard is rough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry , sir . I've never cut a customer . Shall I trim your moustache ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , I've finished . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful . How much is the cost altogether ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Thank you , bye-bye !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bye-bye . Welcome to come next time !
segments.speaker: S1
